mapper.select: SELECT b.name as planName, a.plan_id as planId, e.name as packageInfoName, c.name as bizTypeStr, d.super_divide as superDivideLong, d.self_divide as selfDivideLong, d.child_divide as childDivideLong, d.super_scale, d.self_scale, d.child_scale FROM commission_plan_members a LEFT JOIN commission_plan b ON a.plan_id = b.id LEFT JOIN commission_type c on a.type_id = c.id LEFT JOIN commission_plan_conf d on a.plan_id = d.plan_id LEFT JOIN commission_type_package e on d.type_package_id = e.id where a.child_employee_id = #{employeeId}
